channel.title: Help with making Server public
channel.description:
Hellp moparscape users, im here today to ask if any one could help me with my problem... i want to be able to make the client so that my friends can play aswell i download the source and client "miirscape" http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471523.0.html could someone please explain how to make it so others can connect? thanks
~Gunnarx~

item.title: Help with making Server public
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito
item.description:
@Incognito wrote:

You need to portforward for people to be able to connect through your firewall with your desired server IP address.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making Server public
item.dc:creator: @deathlypkz deathlypkz
item.description:
@deathlypkz wrote:

Requirements
UTorrent
No-Ip

i can help you easily go to ur scource client>search either miirscape or whatever or 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.0 then change to your ip

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making Server public
item.dc:creator: @gunnarx gunnarx
item.description:
@gunnarx wrote:

So basically I can keep all the Ip’s at 127.0.0.1 but if they wanna connect i give them the no-ip or my ip address??

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making Server public
item.dc:creator: @Xdivinex Xdivinex
item.description:
@Xdivinex wrote:

Your doing nothing wrong if you want your friends to connect just go through and do all the basic portforwading and make sure you have your no-ip open. Then set your ip to 127.0.0.1 Your firends will just have to set their ip to the ip address you seup through no-ip.

Read full topic
